Tagline: Small high-tech OEM of high-precision, high-performance micropumps and other components for demanding applications
Overview:
Original Equipment Manufacturer of micro gear pumps and other fluid components and systems since 2002. Flight Works, Inc. offers the smallest, high-quality fluid pumps with the highest level of quality and performance capabilities on the market. The Flight Works product catalog includes a wealth of options for a variety of applications and markets, from medical to aerospace, and the custom development capabilities of our experienced engineering team will find a solution for nearly any fluid flow project you can imagine.

The company primary markets include fuel pumps for UAVs, pumps for space propulsion and on-orbit fluid management, and commercial markets.

The company is vertically integrated with design, most of the manufacturing, and testing performed in house. As such, our employees are involved in many aspects of the business.

Visit our website at www.flightworksinc.com to explore our capabilities, or email us at info@flightworksinc.com with questions or requests.
